value.title: Round time to nearest 15 min with Power Query
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to round time to the nearest 15 minutes in Power Query, but of course, the same formula can be applied to other time intervals. value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI
